snippets.name: Factory Reset
snippets.content: Factory Reset Completed.

snippets.name: Meets Specs
snippets.content: All tests completed and passed. Unit meets all published specifications.

snippets.name: RMA
snippets.content:
Go to the following link to fill out our online RMA request. 

https://sitexservice.bluefolder.com/portal/

Once you have submitted the form you will be issued a 4-digit RMA number and given the return shipping address.

Write the RMA number on the shipping container the unit is being returned in (or on a note placed inside).

If you believe this is a warranty related issue please send us a copy of your sales receipt, or other proof of purchase, in the box with the unit being returned as well.

snippets.name: Software Update
snippets.content: Updated software/firmware to current version.

snippets.name: Test All
snippets.content: Completed power cycle test of unit (unit has been shut down and restarted many times). Completed functional test of unit (buttons, knobs, switches, touch screen, features). All data interface ports have been tested and found to be fully functional. Completed all performance tests (transmitters, receivers, and card readers). All tests completed and passed. Unit meets all published specifications.

snippets.name: Test Burn In
snippets.content: Completed multi-hour equipment burn in test.

snippets.name: Test Chart Card
snippets.content: Completed chart card integrity test.

snippets.name: Test Functional
snippets.content: Completed functional test of unit (buttons, knobs, switches, touch screen, features).

snippets.name: Test Interfaces
snippets.content: All data interface ports have been tested and found to be fully functional.

snippets.name: Test Performance
snippets.content: Completed all performance tests (transmitters, receivers, and card readers).

snippets.name: Test Power Cycle
snippets.content: Completed power cycle test of unit (unit has been shut down and restarted many times).

snippets.content: User data was backed up prior to repair start.
